txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Razor sharp claws from the worms surrounding Gabilshathûr. Delivery of the items should be made to Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
'We could use the worm-claws as weapons if we ran out of metal. We may need to be prepared for all situations.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Razor Sharp Claws
The dwarves at Gabilshathûr await a delivery of razor sharp claws to be made to Avar.
Deliver the razor sharp claws to Avar at Gabilshathûr in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver razor sharp claws from the worms surrounding Gabilshathûr and bring them to the dwarf Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
Wanted: Razor sharp claws from the worms surrounding Gabilshathûr.
